DOC.brief_summary: Aim 1 is to study prevalence and 1 year incidence of metabolic syndrome in major depressive disorder and factors correlation. Aim 2 is to study prevalence and 1 year incidence of thyroid dysfunction in major depressive disorder and factors correlation.
DOC.brief_title: Incidence of Metabolic Syndrome and Thyroid Dysfunction in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: patient with major depressive disorder age over 18 years subject who cannot give information.
